## getPointerParts variable

Returns the root object and the path of the pointer.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getPointerParts: (p: Pointer<$IntentionalAny> | Pointer<{}> | Pointer<unknown>) => {
    root: {};
    path: PathToProp;
}
```

## Example


```ts
const {root, path} = getPointerParts(pointer)
```
